data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Lhasa, Xizang, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lhasa, Xizang, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Lhasa that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Lhasa, Xizang, China.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Lhasa, Xizang, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Tibetan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Tibetan people.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Lhasa that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Lhasa access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lhasa, Xizang, China has a population of 181,200.

We estimate Lhasa has 13,746 people who might know Jesus, 2,927 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 164,527 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Lhasa, Xizang, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.
